data.lyric:
[ti:We Back]
[ar:Jason Aldean]
[al:]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.44]We Back - Jason Aldean
[00:13.84]Where's the guy in the steel toes covered in dirt
[00:16.92]Just a Rock 'n' Roll T-shirt headed to work
[00:20.01]With pack of red man in his pocket
[00:22.91]He's kind of red man but he's rockin'
[00:26.20]Where's the beat up tele and the Marshall stack
[00:29.24]Little Marshall Tucker and a six-pack
[00:32.33]Where's the good ol' boys and the good ol' days
[00:35.43]Straight up gettin' sideways
[00:37.61]We back we back we back in the speakers
[00:41.23]Back in black getting blasted in the bleachers
[00:44.58]It's probably true what my momma said
[00:47.52]I do it just like my daddy did
[00:50.03]We back we back we back in the saddle
[00:53.44]Back on the stage making the whole place rattle
[00:56.60]Back with the A-Team train on the track
[00:59.60]Thought we were gone but you wrong now it's on we back
[01:09.22]Where's the chick wearin' blue jeans a little too tight
[01:12.40]Got a grip on a koozie if it's what she likes
[01:15.77]Getting picked up in a pickup and kickin' it with guys like us
[01:20.79]We back we back we back in the speakers
[01:24.27]Back in black getting blasted in the bleachers
[01:27.49]It's probably true what my momma said
[01:30.62]I do it just like my daddy did
[01:33.05]We back we back we back in the saddle
[01:36.55]Back on the stage making the whole place rattle
[01:39.62]Back with the A-Team train on the track
[01:42.68]Thought we were gone but you wrong now it's on we back
[01:58.23]Sun comes up and sun goes down yeah
[02:04.24]Everything good comes back around
[02:10.04]We back we back
[02:16.12]We back we back we back in the speakers
[02:19.60]Back in black getting blasted in the bleachers
[02:22.91]It's probably true what my momma said
[02:26.03]I do it just like my daddy did
[02:28.50]We back we back we back in the saddle
[02:32.05]Back on the stage making the whole place rattle
[02:35.07]Back with the A-Team train on the track
[02:38.14]Thought we were gone but you wrong now it's on we back
[02:41.65]We back we back
[02:44.34]Thought we were gone but you wrong now it's on
[02:46.94]We back
[02:47.80]We back we back
[02:50.64]It's probably true what my mama said
[02:53.16]We back we back we back in the saddle
[02:56.55]Back on the stage making the whole place rattle
[02:59.69]Back with the A-Team train on the track
[03:02.69]Thought we were gone but you wrong now it's on we back
data.trans:
[ti:We Back]
[ar:Jason Aldean]
[al:]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.44]//
[00:13.84]那个穿着泥泞铁头鞋的男人在哪里
[00:16.92]穿着摇滚T恤去上班
[00:20.01]他的兜里放着一包香烟
[00:22.91]他是个印第安人 但他很有范
[00:26.20]那年久失修的电视和吉他扩音器在哪里
[00:29.24]听着Marshall Tucker的歌 喝着啤酒
[00:32.33]那些旧朋友和旧时光都去了哪里
[00:35.43]都已经渐行渐远
[00:37.61]我们回归了 重新拿起麦克风
[00:41.23]再次来到露天表演场 点燃观众的激情
[00:44.58]我妈妈说的话可能是真的
[00:47.52]我现在的性子就像我的老爸
[00:50.03]我们回归了 重新开始掌控全场
[00:53.44]回到舞台上 让所有人一起欢呼雀跃
[00:56.60]和最棒的团队回归 重回正轨
[00:59.60]以为我们一去不回 但你错了 现在我们回来了
[01:09.22]那个穿着蓝色紧身牛仔裤的姑娘在哪里
[01:12.40]只要她喜欢 什么都满足她
[01:15.77]用皮卡车接她走 然后和我们这样的人一起嗨
[01:20.79]我们回归了 重新拿起麦克风
[01:24.27]再次来到露天表演场 点燃观众的激情

[01:42.68]以为我们一去不回 但你错了 现在我们回来了
[01:58.23]太阳升起 太阳落下
[02:04.24]所有的快乐都会回到我们身边
[02:10.04]我们回归了
